alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands; Santa Susana Mountains; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Western Antelope Valley Foothills; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor; Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 06 at 7:46PM PST until January 07 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northwest to north 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 80 mph are possible. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Western Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area, Santa Susana Mountains and Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being in forested areas and around large trees. If possible, remain inside and avoid windows. Use extra caution if you must drive.
